sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个副词均有"后来，以后"之意。
means:
afterward(s)与later的不同之处有两点。
1.afterwards指一整段时间之后，一般不分具体时间连用，而later常指一个具体的时间点之后。
2.afterward(s)强调事物的先后顺序，而later侧重"迟、推迟"。

sentence.Network_en: At a later news conference, he said differences should not be dramatized.
sentence.Network_cn: 在后来的新闻发布会上，他说不应夸大分歧。

sentence.Network_en: I hate to rush you but I have another appointment later on.
sentence.Network_cn: 我真不想催你，但我稍后还有一个约会。

sentence.Network_en: I imagine they'll be tearing the building down sooner or later.
sentence.Network_cn: 我猜他们早晚会拆除这座楼的。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 七年级英语单词表 ... wash 洗;洗涤 later 后来;以后 the Children’s Palace 少年宫.
七年级英语单词表 ... wash 洗;洗涤 later 后来;以后 the Children’s Palace 少年宫.
以前(Previously)以后(Later) 这个题目取自与A-lin的歌《以前以后》,没有原因,... 那一年,我把你摔碎的手镯埋在了你家后面的山坡上。  回到“以前”,也许.
八年级下册英语书单词表_百度知道 ... open 打开 later 稍后 give away 分发.

list.abs: 英语词汇-物理词汇(1)-专业词汇-中国教育文摘 ... latent heat 潜热 lateral 横向，侧向，旁向 lateral inversion 横向倒置.
英语词根6 - Leo.Zhu - 博客园 ... lacteal a 乳汁的；乳白的 lateral a 旁边的，侧面的 lax a 松弛的.
韩中物理辞典... ... 【transversal Stark effect】 横向斯塔克效应 【lateral motion】 横向运动, 侧摆 【transversal】 横向的,横切的.

entry.def: Later is the comparative of late.
You use later to refer to a time or situation that is after the one that you have been talking about or after the present one.
You use later to refer to an event, period of time, or other thing which comes after the one that you have been talking about or after the present one.

example.ex: At a later news conference, he said differences should not be dramatized...
example.tran: 在后来的新闻发布会上，他说不应夸大分歧。

example.ex: The competition should have been rescheduled for a later date...

entry.def: You use later to refer to the last part of someone's life or career or the last part of a period of history.

example.ex: He found happiness in later life...
In his later years he wrote very little...

means.word_mean: 1. coming at a subsequent time or stage;

sentences.sentence: "the future president entered college at the age of 16"

means.word_mean: 2. at or toward an end or late period or stage of development;

sentences.sentence: "later medical science could have saved the child"

means.word_mean: 1. happening at a time subsequent to a reference time;

sentences.sentence: "he's going to the store but he'll be back here later"

means.word_mean: 2. at some eventual time in the future;

auth_sentence.content: His mother later married David Hardie, a carpenter.
auth_sentence.res_content: His mother later married David Hardie, a carpenter.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His mother later married David Hardie, a carpenter.

auth_sentence.content: Two years later she was already training with Wales.
auth_sentence.res_content: Two years later she was already training with Wales.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Two years later she was already training with Wales.

auth_sentence.content: Mr Grant later said he stood by his claim.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mr Grant later said he stood by his claim.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mr Grant later said he stood by his claim.

Sentence.sentence: But chariots maintained their place in parades and triumphs right up until the end of the Roman Empire 1,500 years later.
Half a century later GM is a typical example of poor management.
For the consumer, it's a matter of paying now for the hardware to save later on the utilities

means.word_mean: 较晚地; 以后；后来；随后

sentences.en: We later learnt that this wasn't true at all.
sentences.cn: 我们后来了解到根本不是这么回事。

sentences.en: He fell ill on Monday and died three days later.
sentences.cn: 他星期一得病, 三天后就死了。

sentences.en: Tom and Mary got married in 1985.Two years later, they were divorced.
sentences.cn: 汤姆和玛丽1985年结婚, 两年后他们离婚了。

jushi.english: Tom and Mary got married in 1985.Two years later, they were divorced.
jushi.chinese: 汤姆和玛丽1985年结婚,两年后他们离婚了。

jushi.english: We later learnt that this wasn't true at all.
jushi.chinese: 我们后来了解到根本不是这么回事。

jushi.english: He fell ill on Monday and died three days later.
jushi.chinese: 他星期一得病,星期三就死了。
